VarDescription: Current year peak flow at MF gauge
Percent of redds in the sun (air only)

Note: Confounded w Year, Always include interaction b/c that's where we believe true effect is.
If there is an effect here consider removing records from dataset where AveBadCond=yes
Confounded w Year. EscapeEst as surrogate for redd_density when density and clustering of true redds unknown
Use log because range is very large.
Expect threshold effect - at certain depth, omissions increase dramatically
